columns.description: The rank of different video games based on their global sales.
The name of the video game.
The type of device or console the came is played on.
The year the game was released.
The company that published the game.
The sales of the game in millions of units in North America.
The sales of the game in millions of units in Europe.
The sales of the game in millions of units in Japan.
The sales of the game in millions of units in places outside of Europe, North America, and Japan..
The sales of the game in millions of units globally.
